Aircraft navigation lights are required between sunset and sunrise.  

During the period between sunset and sunrise no person may :

1. operate an aircraft unless it has lighted position lights,
2. park or move an aircraft in an area of an airport where night operations are being conducted unless it is clearly illuminated, has position lights, or is in an area marked by obstruction lights.
